description.0: This gilded blade was made using precious white branches. It was once used to destroy countless poisons that infested the forest.

0.0: CRIT Rate is increased by <cryo>4%</cryo>. After Normal Attacks deal Elemental DMG, the Foliar Incision effect will be obtained, increasing DMG dealt by Normal Attacks and Elemental Skills by <cryo>120%</cryo> of Elemental Mastery. This effect will disappear after 28 DMG instances or 12s. You can obtain Foliar Incision once every 12s.
